nodes.message: There are so many ways for Shawn to get kicked out of this room WITHOUT going through the goodbye logic, we just want to make sure that if he does, he doesn't do the "nice to meet you" goodbye.

nodes.text: Huh? What you doing here? This Ferdy home!
Go away. Ferdy no like univited guests.
You monster - you killed two children! I'm here to avenge them.
Ferdy not monster - Ferdy is Minotaur! Ferdy kill no one - but Ferdy will kill you.
I'm a hero - You're a monster. You clearly deserve to die.
Wait - what? You come Ferdy's home. You threaten Ferdy's life.
Yet Ferdy is the Monster? Ferdy not following your logic here...
But Ferdy knows best defense is strong offense - and if you want fight, Ferdy will give you fight. Prepare to die!

nodes.message: Moved "hadChoice" into the AvoidCombat menu option so if Shawn just keeps running, he doesn't magically make up with the Minotaur automatically

nodes.text: You! You want fight? Ferdy give you fight!
I have a real beef with you - I'm no cow-ard and that's no Bull!
Look, I'm sorry. I didn't come here to fight you.
Then why you here? Ferdy about to put opponent in checkmate.
But there's no other player... and the chess pieces haven't moved...
Ferdy good at seeing game in brain.
Maybe you come back other time. Ferdy studying our last game in head. Ferdy be even better next time we play chess.
Shawn here again! Maybe Shawn play game of chess with Ferdy?
Oh, you back. Need something?
You make big mistake. I am not just brains... Am brawn also!
Bring it on!
I'm Shawn O'Conner. I was just exploring the Catacombs. I didn't realize that this was your home.

nodes.message: Using "AlwaysShow" and tags so I can properly control which options appear when, as this menu is used frequently and repeatedly.

nodes.text: So what's a nice gentlebeing like you doing in a place like this?
This Ferdy's home. Ferdy artist. Ferdy carve stone, make sarcophagi. Here, Ferdy is safe from bad men. Ferdy is free, not slave.
Most strangers leave Ferdy alone.
You used to be a slave?
On island home, every year, Slavers come to home. Minotaur tribe small, cannot fight Slavers. Ferdy and other young bulls go with Slavers, and Slavers not kill cows and calves.
Have you ever gone back home?
One day, Ferdy will have money from carving sarcophagi. Ferdy will buy other Minotaurs' freedom. Minotaurs will go back and stop Slavers. No Slaver will ever take Minotaurs again.
That is the day that Ferdy will go home.
You didn't happen to see or smell my friend Joel since we last spoke, did you?

Ferdy do some sniffing for Shawn. Smell around Catacombs entrance from castle. Smell you. Smell man with stinky hair oil who came to Catacombs with man who smell of cologne. Stinky hair oil man left Catacombs all scared. Man with cologne did not leave.
That's all Ferdy could smell.
Thanks. The man who smells of cologne is probably Joel - and he must still be somewhere around here.
Did you happen to see a man - shorter than me, well-dressed - wandering around the Catacombs recently? He's missing and I'm trying to find him.
(sniff) Ferdy not smell anyone in this part of Catacombs but you. Ferdy not see anyone near here. But Catacombs big. Ferdy not smell all places.

options.text: Challenge Ferdy to a Chess Game

nodes.text: Would you like to play a game of chess?
Ferdy very happy to play chess.
You play chess?
Ferdy love to play chess! Ferdy learn as small calf. Ferdy good chess player.
Would you like to play a game of chess with me?
Ferdy would very much like to play chess!
Ferdy very happy to play chess with Shawn.
It was nice meeting you, Ferdy.
Good to meet you, Shawn. Come again sometime. Maybe Ferdy make you sarcophagus.
I'll keep that in mind, thanks.
Have fun, Ferdy. I'll see you again sometime.
Take care. Catacombs can be bad place. Ferdy look forward to seeing you again - alive.
Here is deal. We play game. If Ferdy win, you come back and play another game of chess. If you win, Ferdy give you gift.
But do not worry. I am very good at chess.
Let us see how good you are.
Checkmate!
Huh. Okay - you win.
You won. What prize you want?
How about some money for this game?
You teach Ferdy new way to play chess. This good for Ferdy. You can have fifty Lyra for lesson.
Maybe you come another time and we play chess again.
How about some food for winning this game?
You want oats and grain? Grape and olive pomace? Most humans not eat what Ferdy eat.
Maybe I should ask for something else.
I want the locket that belongs to the ghostly children.
Locket special to Ferdy, but you won chess game. Ferdy will keep his word. Here, take locket.
Thanks for the game! And this locket!
Ferdy clearly needs to study game more hard. Now leave me with thoughts.
Checkmate! Hahaha, Ferdy's brains are bigger than yours. You need to practice more before you challenge Ferdy! Ferdy will enjoy beating you again.
As you prepare. So shall Ferdy prepare. Now leave Ferdy with study. Ferdy looks foward our next game.
Checkmate.
Huh. Clearly Ferdy need new chessboard. This one broken.
Nice play. Ferdy did not see that coming.
Okay, what Shawn want as prize for winning?
Money will make a fine prize.
Okey-dokey, Ferdy will pay for this lesson.
Come back and we play chess again sometime.

options.text: Let the Minotaur Name the Prize

nodes.text: What do you think will be a fair prize?
Hmmm. Catacombs dangerous place. Ferdy not like friend to get hurt...
Here. Ferdy give friend special stuff. Use special stuff on weapon to help against bad ghostie thingies.
Thanks. I can use that.
I want the locket that belongs to the ghostly children.
Locket special to Ferdy, but you won chess game. Ferdy will keep his word. Here, take locket.
Thanks for the game! And this locket!
Checkmate! Good game... you make Ferdy work for this win.
Ferdy look forward to next game of chess with you.
Checkmate.
Hmmm. Ferdy need to study game more. You too good now.
Very good. You play mean game of chess.
Okay, what Shawn want as prize for winning?
Money will make a fine prize.
Here your money.
Come back and we play chess again sometime.

options.text: Let the Minotaur Name the Prize

nodes.text: What can you give me?
Many bad things here in Catacombs. I give you protection from spooks.
Take this necklace. It do good things against bad magic. Keep you safer.
Thanks. I can use that.
I want the locket that belongs to the ghostly children.
Locket special to Ferdy, but you won chess game. Ferdy will keep his word. Here, take locket.
Thanks for the game! And this locket!
Checkmate! Ferdy still best at chess.
Go, study, learn. Maybe you beat Ferdy another time.
Ferdy's locket stolen. Why Shawn steal Ferdy's locket?
There are two ghosts of young boys who say that you killed them and stole their locket. The locket even has their painting in it. I was trying to find out if their story was true.
Why Shawn not ask Ferdy about boys? Ferdy loved boys. Ferdy loved boys' mother. That why Ferdy keeps locket - to remember them.
What happened to the boys? Did you kill them?
Ferdy was slave. Boys' mother was kind and good to Ferdy. Boys' father was mean and cruel to Ferdy. Father beat Ferdy. Mother try to stop beating. Mother got hurt.
Ferdy furious to see mother hurt. Ferdy break chains. Boy's father tried to drive Ferdy back with torch.
Burning torch and straw-filled shed not good combination. Ferdy try to stop fire, but shed catch fire. House catch fire. Boys' mother died in fire. Everything burn.
Father blame Ferdy for fire. Tell boys Ferdy kill mother. Father and boys hide in house. All die from smoke. Ferdy find dead boys. Ferdy make sarcophagi for boys. Ferdy want boys to have peace.
Boys think Ferdy bad Minotaur. Ferdy is sad Minotaur.
What about the locket?
Ferdy tried to save boys' mother. Boys' mother gave locket to Ferdy before she die.
I gave the locket back to the ghosts. They thought that their deaths had been avenged, and they disappeared.
Maybe boys are at peace now. Ferdy hopes so.
You go now. Ferdy mourn for boys.
I was planning to give the locket to the ghosts to see if it would set the ghosts free from their need for revenge.
Huh. Go do that, then. Ferdy want boys to be at peace.
Look, the ghost children can't rest because they think you murdered them. I figured that if I gave them the locket, they would think that I avenged their deaths.
So I took your locket and showed it to the ghosts. I guess it worked because they both disappeared.
Good. Ferdy did not want boys to suffer.
Go now. Ferdy will mourn.
I'm going to take the locket to the ghosts. I hope this will set their spirits to rest.
Do that. Ghosts deserve locket more than Ferdy. Ferdy just wants ghosts to find rest.
Locket? What locket? Oh, that locket! The one that was hanging on your wall all tarnished and rusting?
I just thought that I'd take it to a jeweler that I know. He can polish it so that it looks as good as new. You clearly value that locket, so I'd like to make it better for you.
Give Ferdy back that locket!
Oh, right. I wasn't going to keep your locket. Here, take it.
Don't take Ferdy's locket again!
I certainly don't want you to think that I would ever steal that locket from you.

nodes.message: Already gave the locket to the ghost children.

nodes.text: It's kind of a long story why I took the locket, but I'm sorry... I don't have it any more.
There are two ghosts of young boys who say that you killed them and stole their locket. So I stole it back.
Those two ghosts of children who say that you killed them also said you stole their locket. So I stole it back.
I gave the ghosts your locket. They seemed happy about it as they disappeared. Maybe they have passed on now.
Ferdy hope so. Boys were good. They do not need to suffer.
Why Shawn not ask Ferdy about boys? Ferdy loved boys. Ferdy loved boys' mother. That why Ferdy had locket - to remember them.
If Shawn asked, Ferdy would have gladly given locket for boys' sake. No need to sneak and steal.
Go now. Ferdy will mourn.
It's kind of a long story why I took the locket, but I'm sorry... Here - take it. I didn't plan on keeping it.
Good. Locket important to Ferdy. Locket remind Ferdy that there is love in world.
Huh? What you doing here?
You must be thief who stole MY locket! Give me back locket!

options.text: Try to Bluff and Maintain Your Innocence

nodes.text: You had a locket stolen? I'm sorry to hear that. There are a lot of thieves running around this catacombs right now. I suspect one of them must have stolen it.
Ferdy smell good. Only other smell here is yours. And now you stink of fear and lies.
Ferdy hate smell of lies.

options.text: Apologize and Give the Locket Back

nodes.text: Look, I'm sorry I tried to steal the locket. I just assumed that you were a stupid monster. I didn't know you were so smart or that you had such a good sense of smell.
(Snort) That is obvious.
Look, you can have the locket back. Here.
Okey-dokey. Now you go and not try to steal from Ferdy again or Ferdy personally teach you why crime does not pay.
There are two ghosts of children in the nearby catacombs near here that blame you for their deaths and want revenge.
Ferdy know ghosts. Ferdy very sorry for ghosts.
I thought that if I bring them this locket, maybe they would be released from their need for vengeance.
Maybe so. Maybe no. (shrug) Worth a try.
Take locket to ghosts. Ferdy hopes it will bring them peace.

options.text: Goad the Minotaur to Fight You

nodes.text: I'm not giving you anything but a taste of my dagger!

options.text: Confront the Minotaur About the Ghosts' Murder

nodes.text: You murdered two boys and stole their mother's locket! I am here to avenge their murder.
Ferdy did not kill boys. Ferdy never kill no one.
The ghosts won't rest until you pay for their deaths.
Ferdy make boys' sarcophagi. Ferdy want boys to be at peace. Ferdy keep locket to remember them always.
Take locket to boys. Give them peace.
I'm not a thief. I'm a Disbarred Bard. Here - take your locket back. It was wrong of me to take it. Please forgive me.
Okey-dokey. Ferdy say what's done is done. Go and not steal again.
You are a monster. I'm here to rid the Catacombs of monsters like you.
So Ferdy is monster? You sneak into Ferdy's home and steal from Ferdy. You want to kill Ferdy. Who is real monster?
Those two ghosts of children in the nearby catacombs near here still blame you for their deaths and want revenge.
Ferdy very sorry. Ferdy doesn't know how to give boys peace.
They told me to bring them their mother's locket...
Take locket to them. Put locket on their grave. Maybe they will be happy.
I'll try that. Maybe it will help.
Did locket help give boys peace?
I haven't delivered it yet. Are you sure you're willing to part with it?
Boys deserve locket more than Ferdy. Ferdy just wants boys to find rest.
Take locket to them soon. Ferdy hope it works.
I gave the ghosts your locket. They seemed happy about it. They thought that their deaths had been avenged.
Then the ghosts disappeared. Maybe they have passed on now.
Ferdy hope so. Boys were good. They do not need to suffer.
Thank you for helping ghost boys. You are good man.
Those two ghosts of children in the nearby catacombs near here still blame you for their deaths and want revenge.
Ferdy very sorry. Ferdy doesn't know how to give boys peace.
Since Shawn talks to Ghosts, maybe you get ghosts to tell you what they need.
There are two ghosts near here who look like young boys. They accuse you of being their murderer.
Ferdy not kill boys. Boys good to Ferdy. Ferdy was slave. Boys give Ferdy apple one time. Boys' mother nice to Ferdy. Ferdy keep her locket to remember their kindness.

Boys' father beat Ferdy, treat Ferdy like big, dumb animal. One day, father beat Ferdy bad. Mother try to stop beating, got hurt. Ferdy break chains. Father try to drive Ferdy away with torch. Shed and house catch fire.
Boys' mother die in fire. Boys' father run to house, blame Ferdy for fire. Boys think Ferdy bad. All afraid to leave house because of Ferdy. All die from smoke.
Ferdy bring boys bodies here and make them nice sarcophagi. Ferdy wishes they were at peace.
They told me to bring them their mother's locket...
Take locket to them. Put locket on their grave. Maybe they will be happy.
I'll try that. Maybe it will help.
